title: Huge yard. Renovated. Unique Space. Near Fresh Pond.
posting_body: ['Freshly renovated 1 bed convertable  to two bedroom or make it a 1 bed and a home office.', ' Garden apartment with a huge yard.', 'Recently renovated in excellent shape.', 'Gorgeous designer appliances and fixtures in bathroom and kitchen.', 'Entry hallway setting the living room back for added privacy.', 'Beautiful tiled floors through out , super large closet in the bedroom.', 'Big bathroom with a tub and gorgeous renovations.', 'Spacious open kitchen into the living room.', ' Everything is in perfect working order, clean new and shiny.', 'Well maintained serene safe and quiet private house.', 'Great location one block to Fresh Pond and  the M train 5 mins walking distance and every single amenity and convenience that you need for easy daily living.', 'Cafes bakeries bars within a couple of blocks.', 'If you  are interested in this apartment or any of my other strictly exclusive Astoria, Ridgewood, Bushwick, Glendale, and Middle Village listings, please contact by replying to this post.', 'Please feel free to provide any information you consider pertinent to your search.', 'Ridgewood Based Independent Broker.', 'Representing strictly hands on local owners of small buildings and houses.', 'No large buildings or impersonal managements.', 'Video available upon request', 'Andrea Bohackova', 'Licensed Real Estate Broker', 'Sales Rentals Property Management', 'Manhattan Queens Brooklyn', '917-291-2149', '<URL>', '<URL>', '<URL>']
